name: The Brand Agency
tagline: West Hollywood Entertainment Marketing and PR Firm
description:
We are a full service, entertainment marketing, and public relations firm.
Our mission is to communicate your value to the right audience using authenticity.
Based on commercial needs, target markets and specific areas of focus, The Brand Agency matches each client with highly customized teams that combine the best experience and expertise to drive measurable results for companies, products, events and people that directly impact revenue.
